Title: Establishes a direct support wage enhancement to employees that provide direct care support or any other form of treatment, to individuals with developmental disabilities
Summary: Establishes a direct support wage enhancement to employees that provide direct care support or any other form of treatment, to individuals with developmental disabilities and whose income is less than $125,000.
ActClause: AN ACT relating to establishing a direct support wage enhancement to employees that provide direct care support or any other form of treatment, to individuals with developmental disabilities
